content.html: Whenever I see that a service's HTTP API is GraphQL I sigh and then wonder if I *really* want to build this integration or not anymore. I don't think I'm a gql hater, but, dang, just let me fetch(`${api}/some/thing`) and be on my way.
content.value:
Whenever I see that a service's HTTP API is GraphQL I sigh and then wonder if I *really* want to build this integration or not anymore.

I don't think I'm a gql hater, but, dang, just let me fetch(`${api}/some/thing`) and be on my way.
